attributes.action: I have just renewed my driving licence
attributes.additional_details: I & my wife have just renewed  our driving licence,s at a cost of £40  for a 10 year licence and only recieving 6 years use.So surely you should only pay £12.

rejection.details: Are you calling on the Government to change the DVLA's tariff, so that people in your position are charged a proportionate amount?  If so, please resubmit your petition.  It would also help other people who may be minded to sign your petition if you explained in the petition description what the circumstances were in which you only received six years' use.
